languages.text: Оскверненная статуя грозно взирает на копошащихся внизу людишек, словно обещая суровую кару тем, кто посмеет ослушаться влады{mf|ку|чицу} судна.
The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.
languages.original_text: Оскверненная статуя грозно взирает на копошащихся внизу людишек, словно обещая суровую кару тем, кто посмеет ослушаться влады{mf|ку|чицу} судна.

traits.locale_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey their {mf|lord|lady} — you.
The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey their {mf|lord|lady} — you.
The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey their {mf|lord|lady} — you.
The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.
The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

languages.text: Die entweihte Statue starrt die unter ihr kauernden Menschen bedrohlich an, als würde sie jedem eine gnadenlose Strafe versprechen, der es wagt, sich {mf|dem Herren|der Herrin} dieses Schiffs zu widersetzen.
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

traits.locale_text: Die entweihte Statue starrt die unter ihr kauernden Menschen bedrohlich an, als würde sie jedem eine gnadenlose Strafe versprechen, der es wagt, sich {mf|seinem Lord|seiner Lady} zu widersetzen — dir.

languages.text: La statue profanée lance un regard menaçant sur les foules apeurées à ses pieds, comme si elle promettait un châtiment sévère à quiconque osera désobéir {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

traits.locale_text: La statue profanée lance un regard menaçant sur les foules apeurées à ses pieds, comme si elle promettait un châtiment sévère à quiconque osera désobéir {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: 这尊亵渎性的雕像恶狠狠地瞪着下面畏缩的人们，象征着你的绝对权威，仿佛要严惩那些胆敢违抗你命令的人。
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

traits.locale_text: 这尊亵渎性的雕像恶狠狠地瞪着下面畏缩的人们，象征着你的绝对权威，仿佛要严惩那些胆敢违抗你命令的人。

languages.text: La estatua profanada mira amenazadora a la gente que se estremece ante ella, como si prometiera un duro castigo contra quienes osen desobedecer a{mf|l| la} señor{mf||a} de la nave.
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

traits.locale_text: La estatua profanada mira amenazadora a la gente que se estremece ante ella, como si prometiera un duro castigo contra quienes osen desobedecer a su señor{mf||a}. Es decir, a ti.

languages.text: 神聖さを汚す像は、下で小さくなる人々を威嚇的に睨みつける。まるでこの船の主、つまりあなたに歯向かって従わない者達に、厳しい罰を与えると約束しているのようだ。
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.

traits.locale_text: 神聖さを汚す像は、下で小さくなる人々を威嚇的に睨みつける。まるでこの船の主、つまりあなたに歯向かって従わない者達に、厳しい罰を与えると約束しているのようだ。

languages.text: Kutsallıktan arındırılmış heykel, ayaklarının dibindeki korkmuş kalabalığa tehditkârca bakıp sanki bu geminin efendisine itaatsizlik etmeye cüret edecek herkese ağır bir ceza verileceğini vadediyor.
languages.original_text: The desecrated statue glares menacingly at the people cowering below, as if promising severe punishment to those who dare to disobey the {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel.
